title: Customer Plan Change Request - Downgrade
description: A customer wants to downgrade their plan to save money.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their current plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer and their current service plan.

tasks.description: Analyze the customer's average monthly usage (data, calls, texts) over the last 6 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the customer's typical usage profile.

tasks.description: Present suitable downgrade options that still meet their average usage, explaining the cost savings and feature differences.
Process the plan change selected by the customer and confirm the date it becomes effective.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the plan and informs the customer of the activation date.
